scripts.restart: sudo docker-compose build app && sudo docker-compose up -d app
scripts.build: cd client && npm i && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:update: cd client && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && zip -x "client/*" "node_modules/*" "README.md" "cli/*" "content/*" -r tms_update.zip *
scripts.deploy: sudo docker-compose build && sudo docker-compose up -d
scripts.update: git pull && npm run build && npm run restart
scripts.create: git pull && npm run build && npm run deploy
